ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: Create and customize interactive carousels using the 'Slick' JavaScript library and the 'htmlwidgets' package. The carousels can contain plots produced in R, images, 'iframes', videos and other 'htmlwidgets'.  These carousels can be created directly from the R console, and viewed in the 'RStudio' internal viewer, in Shiny apps and R Markdown documents.

Create and customize interactive carousels using the 'Slick' JavaScript library and the 'htmlwidgets' package. The carousels can contain plots produced in R, images, 'iframes', videos and other 'htmlwidgets'.  These carousels can be created directly from the R console, and viewed in the 'RStudio' internal viewer, in Shiny apps and R Markdown documents.

name: r-slickr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-slickr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/slickR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/slickR/slickR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0bee088caacb3d478bd2aa28855c8d746bf7f240754209ef4def47040715e706

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-base64enc
    - r-checkmate
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-xml2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-base64enc
    - r-checkmate
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-xml2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('slickR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('slickR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://yonicd.github.io/slickR
  dev_url: https://github.com/metrumresearchgroup/slickR
  doc_url: https://yonicd.github.io/slickR/reference/index.html
  license: MIT
  summary: Create and customize interactive carousels using the 'Slick' JavaScript library and the 'htmlwidgets' package. The carousels can contain plots produced in R, images, 'iframes', videos and other 'htmlwidgets'.  These carousels can be created directly from the R console, and viewed in the 'RStudio' internal viewer,
    in Shiny apps and R Markdown documents.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - phue
